Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core

Interface Initializable

All Known Subinterfaces:
YaegerScene
All Known Implementing Classes:
CenteredShapeEntity, CircleEntity, CompositeEntity, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicCompositeEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicScene, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, EllipseEntity, EntityCollection, EntityMotionInitBuffer, RectangleEntity, SceneCollection, ScrollableDynamicScene, ShapeEntity, SplashScene, SpriteEntity, StaticScene, TextEntity, YaegerEntity, YaegerStage
public interface Initializable
Stating an Object is Initializable exposes the init(Injector) lifecycle hook.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    beforeInitialize()
    A default method to be used as a lifecycle hook to be called before a YaegerEntity is initialized and added to the YaegerScene.
    void
    init(com.google.inject.Injector injector)
     

  • Method Details

    • init

      void init(com.google.inject.Injector injector)
      Parameters:
      injector - the Injector used for Dependency Injection

      Note: This method is part of the internal API, and should not be used when implementing a Yaeger game.

    • beforeInitialize

      default void beforeInitialize()
      A default method to be used as a lifecycle hook to be called before a YaegerEntity is initialized and added to the YaegerScene.

      By default, this method is empty.
